channel.title: The Snow Plow Show
channel.description: The Snow Plow Show is released several dozen times a day and is hosted by RedBoxChiliPepper.
channel.itunes:author: RedBox ChiliPepper
channel.itunes:subtitle: Playing music and taking your phone calls.
channel.itunes:summary: The Snow Plow Show is released several dozen times a day and is hosted by RedBoxChiliPepper.

item.title: The Snow Plow Show Episode 003 - News Story Pranks
item.description: This Dark Stranger inspired show takes a couple of different news stories that have happened recently and pranks the victim of one and what could have been victims of others. You'll also see how easily any pizza place will give up customer information. Music in this episode is by Rappy McRapperson.
item.guid: The Snow Plow Show Episode 003 - News Story Pranks
item.itunes:author: Redbox Chilipepper
item.itunes:subtitle: Who do you think I'm are?
item.itunes:summary: This Dark Stranger inspired show takes a couple of different news stories that have happened recently and pranks the victim of one and what could have been victims of others. You'll also see how easily any pizza place will give up customer information. Music in this episode is by Rappy McRapperson.

item.title: The Snow Plow Show Episode 002 - Phreak Squad
item.description: Guess how difficult it is to call various large-chain stores that repair computers and trick them out of their customer information? This SPS episode contains calls to these customers by RBCP, Carlito, Zyklon, Rappy, Petty Pranks and Trev0r. All music in this episode is by The Pool Boys.
item.guid: The Snow Plow Show Episode 002 - Phreak Squad
item.itunes:author: Redbox Chilipepper
item.itunes:subtitle: Sorry for deleting all those pics of your godchildren.
item.itunes:summary: Guess how difficult it is to call various large-chain stores that repair computers and trick them out of their customer information? This SPS episode contains calls to these customers by RBCP, Carlito, Zyklon, Rappy, Petty Pranks and Trev0r. All music in this episode is by The Pool Boys.

item.title: The Snow Plow Show Episode 001 - Car Ding Calls
item.description: The very first episode of SPS includes a bunch of car ding calls and is about 20 minutes long. The background and ending music is Speedos and an Abraham Lincoln Hat by Rappy McRapperson.
item.guid: The Snow Plow Show Episode 001 - Car Ding Calls
item.itunes:author: Redbox Chilipepper
item.itunes:subtitle: My cousin is a cop. And, oh yeah, Im a cop too.
item.itunes:summary: The very first episode of SPS includes a bunch of car ding calls and is about 20 minutes long. The background and ending music is Speedos and an Abraham Lincoln Hat by Rappy McRapperson.
